skill.name: api-tester
skill.description: Quick API endpoint testing with comprehensive request/response validation.
skill.summary: Quick API endpoint testing with comprehensive request/response validation.
skill.author: CuriousLearner

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill that provides API testing guidance and examples. It contains no executable code, no network calls, no file system access, and no environment variable access. The skill only provides educational content and testing methodologies.

content.value_statement: Manual API testing is time-consuming and error-prone. This skill provides complete API testing methodologies including security checks, performance testing, and automated test generation.
actual_capabilities: Generate curl commands for any HTTP method
Create Postman collections with test scripts
Write Jest and pytest test suites
Test authentication methods (JWT, OAuth, API keys)
Generate load testing scripts with Artillery
limitations: Does not execute actual API calls
Requires manual implementation of generated tests

use_cases.title: API endpoint validation
use_cases.description: Generate comprehensive test suites for new API endpoints including edge cases and error scenarios.

use_cases.title: Automated testing setup
use_cases.description: Create automated test scripts for regression testing and CI/CD integration.

use_cases.title: Performance benchmarking
use_cases.description: Generate load testing configurations to validate API performance under stress.

prompt_templates.title: Basic API testing
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate curl commands and test cases for GET /api/users endpoint with pagination parameters

prompt_templates.title: Authentication testing
prompt_templates.prompt: Create test scripts for login endpoint that returns JWT token and subsequent authenticated requests

prompt_templates.title: GraphQL validation
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate GraphQL test cases for user queries and createUser mutation with proper error handling

prompt_templates.title: Load testing
prompt_templates.prompt: Create Artillery configuration to test POST /api/orders with 100 concurrent users over 5 minutes

best_practices: Always test both success and error scenarios for complete coverage
Use environment variables for API URLs and authentication tokens
Implement proper test data cleanup after test execution
anti_patterns: Never commit API keys or tokens to version control
Avoid testing only happy path scenarios without error cases
Do not skip authentication testing in public endpoints

faq.question: Which authentication methods are supported?
faq.answer: Bearer tokens, API keys, Basic auth, and OAuth 2.0 with examples for each method.

faq.question: Can I test GraphQL APIs?
faq.answer: Yes, includes GraphQL query and mutation examples with variables and error handling.

faq.question: How do I integrate with CI/CD?
faq.answer: Generates Jest and pytest test suites that can run in any CI/CD pipeline automatically.

faq.question: Is my API data safe?
faq.answer: This skill only generates test code. It does not execute tests or access your actual APIs.

faq.question: What about rate limiting?
faq.answer: Includes rate limit testing strategies and proper delay configurations for load tests.

faq.question: How does this compare to Postman?
faq.answer: Generates Postman collections while also providing code-based tests for automation.
